turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi there.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I need to order coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, which starbucks did you want me to order from?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, and what did you want to order from there?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to get one grande, just regular coffee, with.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: starbucks has two percent and non fat milk, which did you want for the first drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, you know what? Give me 2%.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and did you want these drinks iced or hot?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Both hot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so to confirm, you said you want a grande regular coffee with 2% milk and a venti caramel macchiato with whipped cream Starbucks on Sunset in Los Angeles.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The total for your order will be $11.50.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Place it right now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, the drinks should be ready for pick up in 8 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: anything else i can for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's all right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: bye.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bye.
